title: Cloud - Create New AWS IAM User
description: A client needs a new IAM user created in AWS for a developer, with access restricted to specific services.

tasks.description: Clarify the exact permissions the developer needs (e.g., read-only access to S3 and full access to EC2).
tasks.expected_outcome: The technician has a clear list of required permissions.

tasks.description: Create a new IAM policy with the specified permissions.
tasks.expected_outcome: A new, least-privilege IAM policy is created.

tasks.description: Create the new IAM user and attach the newly created policy to it.
tasks.expected_outcome: The developer user account is created with the correct permissions.
